title: Accessible Object Detection App
shortDescription: AODA is a mobile app built using Flutter and Python, integrated with TensorFlow. Abides by Accessibility for Ontarians with Disabilities Act rules.

title: Olympics API
shortDescription: A REST API was developed to provide comprehensive historical data on the Olympics. Built using Python, FastAPI, Git, and MySQL.

title: Directory Encryption
shortDescription: Utilizing Python, this application features both RSA and AES encryption methodologies to protect user files and data.

title: Meme Delivery Bot
shortDescription: MemeDeliveryBot is a Python-based project designed to automate the process of delivering memes from Reddit to Instagram.
